Sentencas: Reactive air aluminization is attractive as a low-cost, simple method for preparing Al2O3 protective layer for ferritic stainless steel (FSS) components in solid oxide cell stacks.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The FSS Crofer 22H is aluminized at various temperatures to obtain different levels of elements interdiffusion.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The leading role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming the Al2O3 protective layer is investigated in detail.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The roughening mechanism of aluminized surface is discussed.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The formation process of Al2O3 protective layer can be divided into three stages: liquid-solid interdiffusion (< 700 degrees C), solid-solid interdiffusion (700-900 degrees C), and epitaxial growth of Al2O3 (> 900 degrees C).
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The intense interdiffusion between the Al liquid and the steel matrix leads to the formation of Al-containing intermetallic compounds (IMCs) layer in a short time.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: Increasing temperature promotes the diffusion of Al into the steel matrix, causing the phase transition of IMCs.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The surface enrichment of Al suppresses the formation of Fe/Cr-oxides, ensuring the formation of a continuous, dense and crack free Al2O3 layer.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization

Sentencas: The rough surface formed in the first stage basically determines the overall roughness of the sample after aluminization.
Titulo: The role of Al diffusion behavior in the process of forming a super-reliable Al2O3 protective layer during reactive air aluminization
